operators

Class PreCounterThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • operators.PreCounterThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PreCounterThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Class PreCounterThread. The cells of original image are counted by using image of picked cells. Colors or picked cell are split to each channels (alpha, red, green, blue). Each channel value is spread for wider color range and saved to colorList. For example red value for some pixel is 200, then the value is spread for 3 values down and 3 values up (197,198,199,200,201,201,202). When color channel values are determined the original image will be processed. Not all pixels will be determined. The gap value tells how many pixels are let as undetermined between determined pixels. If determined pixels match with colorList color -> collected. The collected pixel positions are grouped to form individual cell positions.

      The Class MovingAverage.

        mod_x - the horizontal direction change

        private void createWeightedPointGroup(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> pointGroups)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the weighted point group. First gets the list of weighted points. Then calculates centroids of weighted points to get the middle point -> saved as the new final coordinate.

      • createWeightPointList

        private java.util.ArrayList<WeightPoint> createWeightPointList(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> pointGroups)
        Creates the weighted points from given list of points. The weight of point is calculated by amount of neighbor points and how far they are. The weight of point is proportional to distance to other points. Lot of points close -> big weight.
        Parameters:
        pointGroups - the point groups
        Returns:
        the array list

                                                               int colorInt)
        Returns the relaxed colors with a very wide range of color. Changes the given color Integer to different channels of colors (red, green, blue). Relaxes each channel by getting a wider range of integer values for each channel and creates a all combinations of them.
        Parameters:
        relaxation - the relaxation
        colorInt - the color int
        Returns:
        the relaxed colors

      • startEndBinarySearch

        private int[] startEndBinarySearch(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> pointList,
                         int lowerBoundValue,
                         int upperBoundValue)
        Uses binary search to find starting and ending indexes of pointList which points are inside given lowerBoundValue and upperBoundValue. Uses only horizontal values in search.
        Parameters:
        pointList - the point list
        lowerBoundValue - the lower bound value
        upperBoundValue - the upper bound value
        Returns:
        the int[] list of found
